title: when will I40 be extended past route 421?
text:
Since I-40 does extend past U.S. 421 west of Winston-Salem, I was
wondering if you were asking about I-140, which does stop at U.S. 421.
Here's a link to a previous post at MyReporter.com that addresses
that question: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=1786
